data.title: Independent People by Nobel Prize Winner Halldor Laxness - Brand New Softcover 9780679767923
data.meta_description:
This is a vintage International Series book titled "Independent People" by Halldor Laxness, a Nobel Prize-winning author. The book is a first edition trade paperback published by Knopf Doubleday Publishing Group in 1997. It has 512 pages and is 8 inches long, 5.2 inches wide, and 1.1 inches high, with a weight of 14 ounces.


The book is a fiction novel written in English and originally in Icelandic. It features topics such as sagas, family life, and literary themes. This item is perfect for collectors and enthusiasts of vintage books.
